summary.span: 命名空間提供進階的 GDI+ 影像處理功能。

span.span: The namespace provides advanced GDI+ imaging functionality.

summary.span: 基本圖形功能是由 命名空間所提供。

span.span: Basic graphics functionality is provided by the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法來記錄與儲存中繼檔。The class provides methods for recording and saving metafiles. 類別可讓使用者將擴充 GDI + 來支援任何影像格式。The class enables users to extend GDI+ to support any image format. 類別提供方法來儲存和擷取映像檔中的中繼資料。The class provides methods for storing and retrieving metadata in image files. > [!CAUTION] > 類別內命名空間不支援在 Windows 或 ASP.NET 服務中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service. 嘗試使用這些類別內其中一個應用程式類型可能會產生非預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務效能和執行階段例外狀況。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
